Title: The China Probrem
Plot: After watching the intimidating opening ceremonies of the recent Olympic games, Cartman understands that the Chinese are only just days away from invading his homeland. While the rest of the American people are haunted by the memory of a recent tragic event, only Butters will stand with Cartman as he confronts the Chinese.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend
